name: Push That One Button
description:
You can break the other buttons, or nudge them out with a wave. But don't let other things distract you from your main goal: Push the button with a different color before the time runs out.

Mechanics:
Score by clicking the different-colored button before the time runs out.
Break the other buttons by clicking on them.
Activate a Wave by holding down the mouse button until the Wave Meter turns blue.
